name: Residencial Caminhos de Gramado
desc_en: Located 2.9 km from Black Lake Park, Residencial Caminhos de Gramado offers accommodation in Gramado. The unit is 4 km from Mini Mundo.  Gramado Bus Station is 4.2 km from Residencial Caminhos de Gramado, while Saint Peter's Church is 5 km away.
well_formatted_address: R. Crescêncio Till, 174, Gramado - RS, 95670-000, Brazil
